mapper.sql: distinct c.CUST_NAME_CHINESE as custName, c.APPLY_ORD_ID as applyOrdId, c.APPLY_ORD_NAME as applyOrdName, pc.code_value as prodBustType, pc.code_content as prodBustTypeName, pt.code_value as actCode, pt.code_content as actCodeName, srv.num as num
mapper.select:
select CUST_NAME_CHINESE, circuitCode, SERIAL_NUMBER, CODE_CONTENT, act_type, case when oprState='预占' then '占用' when oprState ='预释放' then '释放' when act_type='停机' then '释放' else oprState end as oprState , routeInfo, SRVORDID, SERVICEID from (select CO.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, --客户名称 attr.ATTR_VALUE as circuitCode, --电路编码 SO.SERIAL_NUMBER, --业务号码 SO.SERVICE_ID, --产品类型Id pc.CODE_CONTENT , --产品类型名称 SO.ACTIVE_TYPE, --动作类型Id pt.CODE_CONTENT as act_type, --动作类型名称 rescir.OPR_STATE as oprState, -- 路由状态 rescir.ROUTE_INFO as routeInfo, --业务路由信息 SO.SRV_ORD_ID SRVORDID, SO.SERVICE_ID SERVICEID, CO.CREATE_DATE from GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO SO join GOM_BDW_CST_ORD CO on CO.CST_ORD_ID = SO.CST_ORD_ID join ( select ORG_ID from GOM_ORG_S START WITH oRG_ID =(SELECT ORG_ID FROM GOM_ORG_S a where a.PARENT_ORG_ID =1 START WITH a.ORG_ID=(select ORG_ID from gom_user_s where user_id=#{user_id}) CONNECT BY prior a.PARENT_ORG_ID=a.ORG_ID ) CONNECT BY PARENT_ORG_ID=prior ORG_ID )b on CO.handle_dep_id=b.org_id left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_res_circuit rescir on so.srv_ord_id=rescir.srv_ord_id left join gom_BDW_srv_ord_attr_info attr on SO.SRV_ORD_ID = attr.SRV_ORD_ID and attr.ATTR_CODE = '20000064' left join ( select code_content, code_value from gom_BDW_code_info where CODE_type = 'operate_type' ) pt on SO.ACTIVE_TYPE = pt.code_value left join ( select code_content, code_value from gom_BDW_code_info where CODE_type = 'product_code' ) pc on SO.SERVICE_ID = pc.code_value where 1=1 and SO.ORDER_TYPE != '102' AND SO.ACTIVE_TYPE NOT IN ('104','105') UNION ALL select CO.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, --客户名称 attr.ATTR_VALUE as circuitCode, --电路编码 SO.SERIAL_NUMBER, --业务号码 SO.SERVICE_ID, --产品类型Id pc.CODE_CONTENT , --产品类型名称 SO.ACTIVE_TYPE, --动作类型Id pt.CODE_CONTENT as act_type, --动作类型名称 rescir.OPR_STATE as oprState, -- 路由状态 rescir.ROUTE_INFO as routeInfo, --业务路由信息 SO.SRV_ORD_ID SRVORDID, SO.SERVICE_ID SERVICEID, CO.CREATE_DATE from (select a.* from ( select a.CST_ORD_ID,a.SERIAL_NUMBER,a.SERVICE_ID,a.ACTIVE_TYPE,a.SRV_ORD_ID,a.ORDER_TYPE, b.SRV_ORD_ID as srv_ord_id_pre from( select max(b.SRV_ORD_ID) SRV_ORD_ID,a.instance_id from gom_bdw_srv_ord_info a left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_info b on a.instance_id = b.instance_id where 1=1 and b.ACTIVE_TYPE in('101','103','106') and a.ACTIVE_TYPE in('104','105') group by a.instance_id ) b left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_info a on a.instance_id = b.instance_id where a.ACTIVE_TYPE in('104','105') ) a ) SO JOIN GOM_BDW_CST_ORD CO on CO.CST_ORD_ID = SO.CST_ORD_ID join ( select ORG_ID from GOM_ORG_S START WITH oRG_ID =(SELECT ORG_ID FROM GOM_ORG_S a where a.PARENT_ORG_ID =1 START WITH a.ORG_ID=(select ORG_ID from gom_user_s where user_id=#{user_id}) CONNECT BY prior a.PARENT_ORG_ID=a.ORG_ID ) CONNECT BY PARENT_ORG_ID=prior ORG_ID )b on CO.handle_dep_id=b.org_id left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_res_circuit rescir on so.srv_ord_id_pre = rescir.srv_ord_id left join gom_BDW_srv_ord_attr_info attr on SO.SRV_ORD_ID = attr.SRV_ORD_ID and attr.ATTR_CODE = '20000064' left join ( select code_content, code_value from gom_BDW_code_info where CODE_type = 'operate_type' ) pt on SO.ACTIVE_TYPE = pt.code_value left join ( select code_content, code_value from gom_BDW_code_info where CODE_type = 'product_code' ) pc on SO.SERVICE_ID = pc.code_value where 1=1 and SO.ORDER_TYPE != '102' AND SO.ACTIVE_TYPE NOT IN ('101','102','103','106') ) t WHERE 1=1
and t.serial_number like '%'||#{serialNumber}||'%'
and t.circuitCode like '%'||#{circuitCode}||'%'
and t.CUST_NAME_CHINESE like '%'||#{custNameChinese}||'%'
order by t.CREATE_DATE desc
mapper.update: UPDATE GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO set create_date = #{testDate} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(INSTANCE_ID) FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO WHERE INSTANCE_ID = #{instanceId}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT SOI.SRV_ORD_ID AS SRVORDID, SOI.SERVICE_ID AS SERVICEID, SOI.SRV_ORD_STAT AS STATE, CO.APPLY_ORD_ID, CO.CUST_ID, CO.CUST_ADDRESS, CO.cust_contact_man_name as link_man, SOI.SYSTEM_RESOURCE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO SOI JOIN GOM_BDW_CST_ORD CO ON SOI.CST_ORD_ID = CO.CST_ORD_ID WHERE SOI.INSTANCE_ID = #{instanceId} and SOI.SRV_ORD_STAT!='10X' ORDER BY SOI.CREATE_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
